verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> he said <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5707><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Verily <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, That <S%G3754><s%> there be <S%G1526><s%> <S%G5748><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> of them that stand <S%G2476><s%> <S%G5761><s%> here <S%G5602><s%>, which <S%G3748><s%> shall <S%G1089><s%> not <S%G3364><s%> taste <S%G1089><s%> <S%G5667><s%> of death <S%G2288><s%>, till <S%G2193><s%> <S%G302><s%> they have seen <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5632><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5756><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> power <S%G1411><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> raiment <S%G2440><s%> became <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5633><s%> shining <S%G4744><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, exceeding <S%G3029><s%> white <S%G3022><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> snow <S%G5510><s%>; so as <S%G3634><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> fuller <S%G1102><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> <S%G5736><s%> white <S%G3021><s%> <S%G5658><s%> them.
